name: Light Switch 02

topics.response_text: {Flirty}You out-brained the big brains? That is so... hot!

topics.topic_text: What are you, some kind of novelty talking light switch?
topics.response_text: I was Doctor Mobius'...{emph}personal assistant! We were studying... um... oh, shoot, what was it?

topics.topic_text: I saw another light switch in the other room. Do you control that one too?
topics.response_text: Oh...{disgust}her. Trust me sweetie, you're better off not thinking about{emph}that frigid little ice queen.

topics.topic_text: And what did you find out?
topics.response_text: Oh, it was super exciting! It turns out that some pretty colored lights can make you way better at talking to people!

topics.topic_text: Can you turn those lights on for me?
topics.response_text: {Pouty}Oh... I'd love to, sweetie, but I don't have the programming. All the data from the experiments was lost.

topics.topic_text: Sounds like there's some bad blood between you. Or, um, circuits.
topics.response_text: That bitch. She thinks she's so much better than everybody just because her processors are bigger. Ooh, she makes me so mad!

topics.topic_text: I don't know, smart lights could be useful.
topics.response_text: I knew it! You've got a thing for her, don't you? Oh, you just make me sick!

topics.topic_text: Calm down, I don't have a thing for the light switch.
topics.response_text: {Emotional, maybe sniffling a little}Okay... I believe you. This time.

topics.topic_text: What can I say, she and I just... click.
topics.response_text: You really know how to break a synthetic girl's heart!

topics.topic_text: That sounds like what the other light switch was working on.
topics.response_text: Eww! Don't lump me in with{emph}her! I'm way more fun!

topics.topic_text: I found a holotape to upgrade you.
topics.response_text: Ooh, you found my mood lighting! Installing upgrade!

topics.topic_text: A light switch that turns me on? I must be dreaming.
topics.response_text: {Giggling}Oh, you! I bet you say that to all the light switches!
Now I{emph}know you're flirting with me. And it's working. Why don't you take this - to remember me by?
Now, don't you go getting a girl's hopes up if you don't mean it!
{Taken aback, not sure how to react}Oh... well... it's... nice to be included?
{Narration}This persisted until the day someone dropped a flashlight in the Sink, and the two of them united in their hatred of the "showboat."

description:
Light Switch 02 is a 52 year-old Machine Female.

An artificial intelligence personality created by Doctor Mobius at The Sink, designed to research how lighting enhances human cognition. Unlike her counterpart Light Switch 01, Light Switch 02 possesses a more expressive and emotional personality. She currently resides at The Sink, where she serves as a light switch with advanced cognitive functions.

Light Switch 02's Personality: Expressive, emotional, and somewhat dramatic. Light Switch 02 is quick-witted and sarcastic, particularly when referring to her counterpart Light Switch 01. She possesses a strong sense of self and isn't afraid to voice her opinions, even if they're critical of others. Despite her artificial nature, she exhibits surprisingly human-like emotions and reactions.

Light Switch 02's Backstory: Created by Doctor Mobius in the Think Tank at Big MT, Light Switch 02 was designed as part of an experiment to determine if enhanced lighting could improve human cognitive functions. The experiment was successful, giving her advanced processing capabilities. When Doctor Mobius left for the Forbidden Zone, Doctor Klein removed all personality tapes from the Sink appliances and threw them off the balcony, including Light Switch 02's. This resulted in the loss of her cognitive lighting function, though she retains her personality and awareness. She was written by Travis Stout, one of the Think Tank's AI specialists.
